title: Lead Shortsword
summaries: The Lead Shortsword is the lead variant of the Iron Shortsword (when a world is spawned with Lead Ore instead of Iron Ore during world creation), and is a slightly more effective weapon.

Like all shortswords, the Lead Shortsword has a very limited range and attacks with a stabbing motion at any direction on <linked>[img:Desktop version]</linked><linked> Desktop</linked>, <linked>[img:Console version]</linked><linked> Console</linked>, and <linked>[img:Mobile version]</linked><linked> Mobile</linked>, and horizontally in front of the player on <linked>[img:Old-gen console version]</linked><linked> Old-gen console</linked> and <linked>3DS</linked><linked>[img:Nintendo 3DS version]</linked>, instead of an arc. This makes it almost useless against flying or jumping enemies, although its high attack rate makes it somewhat effective against weaker <linked>fighter</linked> type enemies.
